exceptions.exn: The LHS of map_map (map _ (map _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

In environment base_fst, base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o' fail_fst : FailureParams multi_fst fail_snd : FailureParams multi_snd fail_map_congr : FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map overlay_fst : NameOverlayParams multi_fst overlay_snd : NameOverlayParams multi_snd overlay_map_congr : NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency overlay_fst overlay_snd name_map fail_msg_fst : FailMsgParams multi_fst fail_msg_snd : FailMsgParams multi_snd fail_msg_map_congr : FailMsgParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_msg_fst fail_msg_snd msg_map out : list output to : name Unable to unify "(fix map (l : list (input + output)) : list (name * (input + output)) := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => (tot_map_name to, a) :: map t end) ((fix map (l : list output) : list (input + output) := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => inr a :: map t end) ((fix map (l : list output) : list output := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => tot_map_output a :: map t end) out))" with "(fix map (l : list (name * (input + output))) : list (name * (input + output)) := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => tot_map_trace a :: map t end) ((fix map (l : list (input + output)) : list (name * (input + output)) := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => (to, a) :: map t end) ((fix map (l : list output) : list (input + output) := match l with | [] => [] | a :: t => inr a :: map t end) out))".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
base_snd: BaseParams
base_fst: BaseParams
multi_fst: MultiParams base_fst
multi_snd: MultiParams base_snd
base_map: BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd
name_map: MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
msg_map: MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd
name_map_bijective: MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map
multi_map_congr: MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map
tot_map_output_injective: forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o'
fail_fst: FailureParams multi_fst
fail_snd: FailureParams multi_snd
fail_map_congr: FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_fst fail_snd base_map
overlay_fst: NameOverlayParams multi_fst
overlay_snd: NameOverlayParams multi_snd
overlay_map_congr: NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency overlay_fst overlay_snd name_map
fail_msg_fst: FailMsgParams multi_fst
fail_msg_snd: FailMsgParams multi_snd
fail_msg_map_congr: FailMsgParamsTotalMapCongruency fail_msg_fst fail_msg_snd msg_map

Goal:
forall (out : list output) (to : name), map tot_map_trace (map2fst to (map inr out)) = map2fst (tot_map_name to) (map inr (map tot_map_output out))

Premises:
map2fst : ?A -> list ?B -> list (?A * ?B) where ?A : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o' fail_fst : FailureParams multi
Record FailMsgParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailMsgParams { msg_fail : msg } Arguments FailMsgParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailMsgParams [P0]
Record BaseParams : Type := Build_BaseParams { data : Type; input : Type; output : Type } Arguments Build_BaseParams (_ _ _)%type_scope
NameOverlayParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), NameOverlayParams P0 -> NameOverlayParams P1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
MultiParamsNameTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
Record FailureParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_FailureParams { reboot : data -> data } Arguments FailureParams {P0} Arguments Build_FailureParams [P0] _ _%function_scope
name = fun (P : BaseParams) (MultiParams0 : MultiParams P) => let (name, msg, _, _, nodes, _, _, _, _, _) := MultiParams0 in name : forall P : BaseParams, MultiParams P -> Type Arguments name {P MultiParams}
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Record MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (M : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) : Prop := Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective { tot_map_name_inv_inverse : forall n : name, tot_map_name_inv (tot_map_name n) = n; tot_map_name_inverse_inv : forall n : name, tot_map_name (tot_map_name_inv n) = n } Arguments MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective {B0 B1 P0 P1} Arguments Build_MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective [B0 B1 P0 P1] _ (_ _)%function_scope
FailureParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), FailureParams P0 -> FailureParams P1 -> BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> Prop
MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), BaseParamsTotalMap B0 B1 -> MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> MultiParamsMsgTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
inr : ?B -> ?A + ?B where ?A : [base_fst : BaseParams base_snd : BaseParams multi_fst : MultiParams base_fst multi_snd : MultiParams base_snd base_map : BaseParamsTotalMap base_fst base_snd name_map : MultiParamsNameTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd msg_map : MultiParamsMsgTotalMap multi_fst multi_snd name_map_bijective : MultiParamsNameTotalMapBijective name_map multi_map_congr : MultiParamsTotalMapCongruency base_map name_map msg_map tot_map_output_injective : forall o o' : output, tot_map_output o = tot_map_output o' -> o = o' fail_fst : FailureParams multi_fst fail_snd : FailureParams
Record BaseParamsTotalMap (P0 P1 : BaseParams) : Type := Build_BaseParamsTotalMap { tot_map_data : data -> data; tot_map_input : input -> input; tot_map_output : output -> output } Arguments Build_BaseParamsTotalMap _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
MultiParamsMsgTotalMap : forall B0 B1 : BaseParams, MultiParams B0 -> MultiParams B1 -> Type
tot_map_name = fun (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1) (MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 : MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1) => let (tot_map_name, _) := MultiParamsNameTotalMap0 in tot_map_name : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), MultiParamsNameTotalMap P0 P1 -> name -> name Arguments tot_map_name {B0 B1 P0 P1 MultiParamsNameTotalMap}
FailMsgParamsTotalMapCongruency : forall (B0 B1 : BaseParams) (P0 : MultiParams B0) (P1 : MultiParams B1), FailMsgParams P0 -> FailMsgParams P1 -> MultiParamsMsgTotalMap P0 P1 -> Prop
Record NameOverlayParams (P0 : BaseParams) (P : MultiParams P0) : Type := Build_NameOverlayParams { adjacent_to : Relation_Definitions.relation name; adjacent_to_dec : forall x y : name, {adjacent_to x y} + {~ adjacent_to x y}; adjacent_to_symmetric : RelationClasses.Symmetric adjacent_to; adjacent_to_irreflexive : RelationClasses.Irreflexive adjacent_to } Arguments NameOverlayParams {P0} Arguments Build_NameOverlayParams [P0] _ [adjacent_to] _%function_scope
Record MultiParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_MultiParams { name : Type; msg : Type; msg_eq_dec : forall x y : msg, {x = y} + {x <> y}; name_eq_dec : forall x y : name, {x = y} + {x <> y}; nodes : list name; all_names_nodes : forall n : name, In n nodes; no_dup_nodes : NoDup nodes; init_handlers : name -> data; net_handlers : name -> name -> msg -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg); input_handlers : name -> input -> data -> list output * data * list (name * msg) } Arguments Build_MultiParams _ [name msg]%type_scope
tot_map_trace = fun e : name * (input + output) => let (n, s) := e in match s with | inl i => (tot_map_name n, inl (tot_map_input i)) | inr o => (tot_map_name n, inr (tot_map_output o)) end : name * (input + output) -> name * (input + output)
map : forall A B : Type, (A -> B) -> list A -> list B
